values: 脚；足；步行；步幅；底部；最下端；英尺（长度单位）；韵脚（诗歌中的节奏单位）；音步（诗歌的节奏结构）；（山的）山脚；（页面的）底部；（缝纫机的）压脚板；袜底
<非正式>支付账单（尤指大额或不合理账单）；步行；走；踩；跳舞；踏步；行进；踩踏；缝制（裤脚等的）边缘
（刹车或泵）用脚操作的；脚踏的；（巡逻队）步行的；步（兵）的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 英尺长度；连续镜头；以尺计算长度
基础；立足处；社会关系；合计
步行；在…上行走；总计（foot的ing形式）

word_group.brief_definition: 步兵；担当重任的普通工作者

word_group.phrase: get a foot in the door

bilingual.target: 把你的脚放在椅子下面。

bilingual.source: Panpan, point to your hand and your foot.
I fell off my bike and hurt my foot.
bilingual.target: 我从自行车上摔下来，伤了脚。

bilingual.source: At the moment, we're at the foot of Yulong Snow Mountain.
bilingual.target: 目前，我们在玉龙雪山脚下。

bilingual.source: At the foot of the hill was a mysterious little hut surrounded by tall pine trees.
bilingual.target: 山脚下有一个神秘的小屋，被高大的松树环绕。

bilingual.source: Yuelu Academy, a very famous school in China in the past, is at the foot of Yuelu Mountain in Hunan Province.
bilingual.target: 岳麓书院，过去中国一所非常著名的学校，位于湖南省的岳麓山脚下。

list.abstract: foot，英文单词，名词、及物动词、不及物动词，作名词时意为“脚；英尺；步调；末尾，人名；(英)富特”，作及物动词时意为“支付；给……换底”，作不及物动词时意为“步行；跳舞；总计”。

yingyinNormal.en: Even simpler this time, kick the ball with your foot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这次更简单了，用你的脚踢球。

yingyinNormal.en: What's your name? How about Big Foot?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你什么名字？大脚如何？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, yeah, you shot yourself on your foot, you put your foot in your mouth, you put the shoe in the wrong foot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，你朝你的脚上开了一枪，你把脚放进自己嘴里[说错话]，你鞋子穿错脚了。

yingyinNormal.en: Why don't you put just one foot into the water? Maybe you should try the other foot. Maybe George should try both feet at the same time. Good idea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 试试看，把一只脚放进水里？或许该试试另一只脚，或许应该把两只脚一起放进水里。这是个好主意！

yingyinNormal.en: Can I use either thumb? I'd rather go with the foot theory.
yingyinNormal.zh: 随便哪个姆指都行？我宁可相信脚长理论。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, whose foot's in my face? It's mine. Give it back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哎，谁把脚放到我脸上了？ 是我的。还给我。

yingyinNormal.en: Then he got more angry and kicked the rock with his other foot. What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后他更生气，用另一只脚去踹那块石头。搞毛啊？

yingyinNormal.en: What happened? I tried to let go of anger and threw a rock into my foot!
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么回事？我试图释放我的气愤，结果扔石头砸到我的脚了。

yingyinNormal.en: What is with you Americans and the foot? I hate that painting, by the way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们美国人为啥什么都要扯到脚啊？顺便说一嘴，我讨厌那幅画。

yingyinNormal.en: No. Your name is Private Idiot. You know why? Cause I have a knife in my foot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不。你的名字是“列兵白痴”。你可知为何？因为我脚上插着刀。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, the weirdest place would have to be the foot of the bed. Step back. We have a winner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，最奇怪的地方是床脚。真没意义。我们有优胜者了。

yingyinNormal.en: Private idiot. Yes, Sergeant. Raise your foot. Higher. Everyone outside now. Move it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 列兵“白痴”。是，中士。把脚抬高。更高。全部出去，马上。行动。

yingyinNormal.en: They feel fine to me. I'm sure they do. You don't have the foot sensitivity of a tramp champ.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得挺好啊。你当然觉得好了，你还没有培养出足够敏锐的脚感。

yingyinNormal.en: Phoebe: Get your foot off my contestant! Judge! Joey: Judge rules, no violation. Phoebe: Oh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 菲比：把你的脚从我的参赛者身上拿开！裁判！乔伊：裁判判定，没有犯规。菲比：唉。

yingyinNormal.en: It turns out I'm the mean boy. Although I did drop it on my own foot, so kind of. What's going on?
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实证明我就是那个恶毒的小男孩。不过我的确有砸到自己的脚，所以你没说错。出什么事了？

yingyinNormal.en: Hi. My friend here was taking down our Christmas lights and she fell off the balcony and may have broken her foot or ankle or something.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我朋友取、下圣诞灯时从阳台跌下来，可能伤了脚或者脚踝或者别的什么。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry! I ran into Cam at the market. He asked if we could go. I panicked. I shot myself in the foot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很抱歉！我在集市上碰到小卡，他问我们能不能去，我就慌了，我自作自受[朝自己脚开一枪]。

yingyinNormal.en: I have a knife in my foot, Sergeant. Oh yes. Of course. That's it, the knife. What is your name soldier? Smitty Riker.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我脚上插着刀，中士。噢，是的，当然。是这把刀。你叫什么名字？士兵。史密提·瑞克。

yingyinNormal.en: So, tell me, how do you think your husband would feel about you sitting here with me, sliding your foot so far up my pant leg you can count the change in my pocket?
yingyinNormal.zh: 告诉我你丈夫做何感想？你坐在我身旁，脚伸到我大腿，足以数我口袋里的零钱？

yingyinNormal.en: In the simplest descriptions of this, the descriptions that you will find in most books that you read, you're simply stretched from head to foot and squeezed from the side by tidal forces, "spaghettified" is what it often says.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在对此最简单的描述中，那些你会在大多数所读的书中看到的所描述的，你会从头到脚都被拉伸，并被潮汐力从侧面挤压，常用的术语叫“拉意面”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (on one's feet)恢复; 复原; 痊愈

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Many researchers have located hundreds of small rural villages and individual dwellings by using aerial photographs and by making surveys on <highlight>foot</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多研究人员利用航拍照片和徒步调查，找到了数百个小村庄和个人住宅。

sense_info_list.en: a unit of linear measure equal to 12
pay the bill for something, especially when the bill is considered large or unreasonable

sense_info_list.zh: (on one's feet)恢复; 复原; 痊愈

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 镜头；录像；一组（电影；电视）镜头；尺码；长度

word_family.mean: n. 脚；足；底端；最下部；底座；英尺；音步；步伐；运动（或吸附）器官；韵脚

sense_info_list.en: a unit of linear measure equal to 12

examination_example.sentence: Higgins had forecast oil at a thousand <highlight>feet</highlight>, a totally made-up figure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Higgins曾预测石油的高度为1000英尺，这完全是捏造的数字。

examination_example.sentence: In January 1901, at 1,020 <highlight>feet</highlight>, almost precisely the depth predicted by Higgins' wild guess, the well roared and suddenly ejected mud.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1901年1月，在1020英尺处，几乎正好是希金斯大胆猜测的深度，油井轰鸣，突然喷出泥浆。

examination_example.sentence: He had "killed a rat with an intricate device at a distance of three <highlight>feet</highlight>."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他“在三英尺远的地方用复杂的装置杀死了一只老鼠。”

examination_example.sentence: It strengthens the muscles in your <highlight>feet</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它加强了你脚上的肌肉。

examination_example.sentence: They are afraid of injuring their <highlight>feet</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们害怕弄伤他们的脚。

examination_example.sentence: Walking around with bare <highlight>feet</highlight> is actually better for your <highlight>feet</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 赤脚走路实际上对你的脚更好。

sense_info_list.en: pay the bill for something, especially when the bill is considered large or unreasonable

word_usage.usage: foot为不规则名词，复数为feet，不是foots。

at the foot of表示“在...脚下”，是固定搭配，不能省略定冠词the。
示例：The factory is located at the foot of a hill. 
工厂坐落在山脚下。
“步行”应该说on foot，而不是by foot。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. & adv. 赤脚的；赤着脚
n. 镜头；录像；一组（电影；电视）镜头；尺码；长度

word_family.mean: n. 脚；足；底端；最下部；底座；英尺；音步；步伐；运动（或吸附）器官；韵脚

sense_info_list.en: a unit of linear measure equal to 12

examination_example.sentence: The lower oxygen pressure found in an aircraft cabin is equivalent to that at 6,000-8,000 <highlight>feet</highlight> of altitude.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 飞机机舱内更低的氧气压相当于海拔6000至8000英尺的氧压。

examination_example.sentence: It is profitable to drill to depths more than 1,000 <highlight>feet</highlight> for oil and gas extraction, but only recently in California has it become profitable to pump water from this depth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 钻探超过1,000英尺的深度进行石油和天然气开采是有利可图的，但是直到最近，在加利福尼亚州才从这种深度抽水变得有利可图。

examination_example.sentence: Previous drilling of wells could only reach depths of 1, 000 <highlight>feet</highlight>, but due to new pumping practices, water deeper than this can now be extracted (抽取) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以前的钻井只能达到1000英尺的深度。但由于新的抽水方法，现在可以抽取更深的水。

examination_example.sentence: The aquifers range from 1, 000 to 3, 000 <highlight>feet</highlight> below the ground, which means that pumping will be expensive and there are other concerns.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地下蓄水层的高度在地下1,000到3,000英尺之间，这意味着抽水会很昂贵，以及其他的问题。

examination_example.sentence: Almost half the center of Paris will be accessible only by <highlight>foot</highlight> or bicycle this Sunday to mark World Car-Free Day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 本周日，为了响应世界无车日，几乎半个巴黎市中心只允许人们步行或骑车。

examination_example.sentence: As grandparents have been saying for generations, kids would travel miles to school in the countryside (often on <highlight>foot</highlight>) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如祖辈几代人一直说的那样，乡下孩子们去上学要走好几英里(通常是步行)。

sense_info_list.en: pay the bill for something; especially when the bill is considered large or unreasonable

word_usage.usage: “步行”应该说on foot，而不是by foot。

at the foot of表示“在...脚下”，是固定搭配，不能省略定冠词the。
示例：The factory is located at the foot of a hill. 
工厂坐落在山脚下。
foot为不规则名词，复数为feet，不是foots。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Your <highlight>feet</highlight> can take you to the most amazing places.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的脚可以带你去最神奇的地方。

examination_example.sentence: The hot spring at the <highlight>foot</highlight> of the mountain is something you must try after the climb.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 山脚下的温泉是爬山后一定要去的地方。

examination_example.sentence: When your cat drops a dead bird at your <highlight>feet</highlight>, she isn't bringing you a present.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你的猫把一只死鸟扔到你脚边时，她并不是在给你送礼物。

examination_example.sentence: Rome's Colosseum was 157 <highlight>feet</highlight> tall and had 80 entrances, seating 50,000 people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 罗马斗兽场高157英尺，有80个入口，可容纳5万人。

examination_example.sentence: There was no shade as the trees were no more than 3 <highlight>feet</highlight> tall.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有树荫，因为树的高度不超过3英尺。

examination_example.sentence: Recently, we bought a twenty-eight-<highlight>foot</highlight> travel trailer complete with a bathroom and a built-in TV set.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近，我们买了一辆28英尺长的旅行拖车，配有浴室和内置电视。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 脚；足；底端；最下部；底座；英尺；音步；步伐；运动（或吸附）器官；韵脚

examination_example.sentence: This is a machine to warm our <highlight>feet</highlight> in winter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一台冬天暖脚的机器。

examination_example.sentence: It's said that there is a kind of bird born without <highlight>feet</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据说有一种鸟天生没有脚。

examination_example.sentence: I remember looking down at my <highlight>feet</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我记得低头看着我的脚。

sense_info_list.en: a unit of linear measure equal to 12

examination_example.sentence: The fence is at least nine <highlight>feet</highlight> high and runs nearly half the block long.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 栅栏至少有九英尺高，几乎有半个街区长。

examination_example.sentence: The electric eel can reach up to 9 <highlight>feet</highlight> long and can weigh up to 22 kg.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电鳗可达9英尺长，重达22公斤。

examination_example.sentence: They were more than 20 <highlight>feet</highlight> in height.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们高超过20英尺。

examination_example.sentence: Nanjing Zijinshan Insect Museum, which will be open to the public soon, was formed at the <highlight>foot</highlight> of Zhongshan on April 2nd.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 南京紫金山昆虫博物馆，即将对外开放，它是4月2日在钟山脚下建成的。

word_usage.usage: foot为不规则名词，复数为feet，不是foots。

at the foot of表示“在...脚下”，是固定搭配，不能省略定冠词the。
示例：The factory is located at the foot of a hill. 
工厂坐落在山脚下。
“步行”应该说on foot，而不是by foot。
